sn22.93:4.2: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, nadī pabbateyyā ohārinī dūraṅgamā sīghasotā.
sn22.93:4.3: Tassā ubhosu tīresu kāsā cepi jātā assu, te naṃ ajjholambeyyuṃ;
sn22.93:4.4: kusā cepi jātā assu, te naṃ ajjholambeyyuṃ;
sn22.93:4.5: pabbajā cepi jātā assu, te naṃ ajjholambeyyuṃ;
sn22.93:4.6: bīraṇā cepi jātā assu, te naṃ ajjholambeyyuṃ;
sn22.93:4.7: rukkhā cepi jātā assu, te naṃ ajjholambeyyuṃ.
sn22.93:4.8: Tassā puriso sotena vuyhamāno kāse cepi gaṇheyya, te palujjeyyuṃ.
sn22.93:4.10: Kuse cepi gaṇheyya, pabbaje cepi gaṇheyya, bīraṇe cepi gaṇheyya, rukkhe cepi gaṇheyya, te palujjeyyuṃ.
sn22.93:4.12: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.93:4.13: attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.93:4.19: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.93:4.20: attani vā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.93:4.23: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
